title: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
subtle:

description: Take a tour through New York City's Metropolitan Museum of Art in this colorful and detailed text. The Metropolitan Museum of Art introduces students to a broad spectrum of art and its place and importance in the modern world. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast information and the proper use of complex sentences. The book and lesson are also available for levels Z1 and Z2.
